ModMetaData.name: Simple Cultivation [B18]
ModMetaData.author: MadWookie
ModMetaData.description:
A simple mod that adds the ability to cultivate soil.
Tilled Soil Has %110 fertility. Requires the "Simple Cultivation" research. Costs 1 Fertilizer to construct.
Cultivated Soil Has %150 fertility. Requires the "Cultivation" research. Costs 5 Fertilizer to construct.
Compost Requires the "Composting" research. Costs 3.5 Nutrition (~75 items) to craft. -Produces 15 Compost. Craft at crafting spots.
Fertilizer Requires the "Composting" research. Costs 1 Compost to craft. -Produces 1 Fertilizer. Craft at a Drug Lab.
Secret Link: http://imgur.com/ZeWUSkr.jpg
Have an idea or suggestion? Feel free to leave it in the comments!
